item.title: 英特尔、三星和中国芯片挑战令 ASML 前景黯淡
item.description: ASML Holding NV 下周发布的财报引发了半导体行业的震动，其顶级客户的支出计划也存在不确定性。【原文：After sending shockwaves through the semiconductor industry following a third-quarter earnings miss, scrutiny is building ahead of ASML Holding NV’s results next week with uncertainty over the spending plans of its top clients.】

item.title: 中国制造的无人机会成为特朗普 "TikTok "待遇的下一个目标吗？
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，德雷克-贝内特（Drake Bennett）将探讨中国制造的无人机是否会成为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赦免的下一个对象。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Drake Bennett considers whether Chinese-made drones could be next in line for a pardon from Donald Trump.】

item.title: 法国呼吁欧盟将巴塞尔交易规则延期一年
item.description: 在英国将新的银行交易资本规则的实施时间推迟到 2027 年之后，法国当局呼吁欧盟同意将新的银行交易资本规则的实施时间推迟到比原计划更长的时间。【原文：French authorities are calling for the European Union to agree to hold off on new bank capital rules on trading for longer than previously planned after the UK pushed back its implementation to 2027.】

item.title: 疫病爆发令德国猪肉出口设备雪上加霜
item.description: 德国近四十年来首次爆发口蹄疫疫情，这对该国举步维艰的猪肉行业来说是又一次打击。【原文：Germany’s first outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease in almost four decades is another blow for the country’s struggling pork sector.】

item.title: Verizon 凭借移动和宽带业务增长超出华尔街预期
item.description: Verizon Communications Inc. 公布的第四季度财务业绩超出分析师预期，其中包括新增移动电话和宽带用户的增长。【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. reported fourth-quarter financial results that beat analysts’ estimates, including gains in new mobile-phone and broadband customers.】

item.title: 拉里-芬克思考美国经济是否预示着日后将加息
item.description: 美国经济的强劲势头让贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）怀疑，美联储是否会在短期内放宽政策后，不得不在日后提高利率。【原文：The strength of the US economy is making BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink wonder if the Federal Reserve may have to resort to increasing interest rates later after easing in the short term.】

item.title: 特朗普力推欧佩克，雪佛龙哈萨克斯坦油田扩产
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.）周五表示，它已完成了哈萨克斯坦巨大的 Tengiz 油田的扩建工程，预计到 2025 年中期，该油田的日产量将达到 100 万桶。【原文：Chevron Corp. said Friday it completed an expansion at Kazakhstan’s huge Tengiz oil field, which is expected to ramp up to pump 1 million barrels a day by mid-2025.】

item.title: 尼日利亚财政部长表示，尼日利亚将在 2025 年利用一系列金融工具
item.description: 尼日利亚财政部长瓦莱-埃顿（Wale Edun）表示，这个非洲最大的石油生产国将利用一系列工具来帮助为今年的预算赤字融资，估计赤字约占国内生产总值的 3.9%。【原文：Nigeria’s Finance Minister Wale Edun said Africa’s largest oil producer will tap a range of instruments to help finance this year’s budget deficit, estimated at about 3.9% of gross domestic product.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数创里根总统以来最佳首周记录
item.description: 这是华尔街想要的。至少在本周，华尔街得到了它：一个对市场友好的唐纳德-特朗普--大谈促进增长和降低税收的政策，同时缩减了立即破坏世界贸易秩序的计划。【原文：It was what Wall Street wanted. And this week at least, it’s what Wall Street is getting: A market-friendly Donald Trump – talking up policies to boost growth and lower taxes, while dialing back plans to immediately disrupt the world trading order.】

item.title: 达沃斯对特朗普新时代的通胀精灵忧心忡忡
item.description: 2025 年达沃斯论坛最后一次会议认为，全球通胀尚未消退，中国以外的发达经济体不能在消费者浮躁和贸易紧张局势下掉以轻心。【原文：Global inflation hasn’t yet died and advanced economies outside China can’t be complacent at a time of fickle consumers and trade tensions, according to the last Davos panel of 2025.】

item.title: 价格下跌导致 JSW 钢铁公司季度利润骤降 70
item.description: 由于全球需求低迷和国内价格疲软，JSW 钢铁有限公司的利润未达预期。【原文：JSW Steel Ltd. missed profit forecasts following sluggish global demand and weak domestic prices.】

item.title: SES 为受马斯克 "星链 "计划影响的债券提供支持
item.description: 最近几周，卫星运营商 SES SA 因竞争加剧，特别是来自埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司的竞争，债券受到冲击，SES SA 采取了支撑债券的措施，引发其债务大幅回升。【原文：Satellite operator SES SA moved to shore up bonds that have been hit in recent weeks by rising competition, particularly from Elon Musk’s Starlink, sparking a sharp recovery in its debt.】

item.title: 欧洲清算公司称，扣押俄罗斯资产可能带来意外结果
item.description: 欧洲清算有限公司（Euroclear Ltd.首席执行官瓦莱丽-乌尔班（Valerie Urbain）警告说，如果欧盟没收俄罗斯中央银行被冻结的资产，将会产生意想不到的后果。【原文：Euroclear Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Valerie Urbain warned of unintended consequences if the European Union were to confiscate frozen assets from Russia’s central bank.】

item.title: 疾病预防控制中心不向公众全面介绍不孕症治疗风险
item.description:
捐献卵子有健康风险。妇女无法了解哪家诊所的不良后果最少。【原文：

Egg donation comes with health risks. Women are unable to learn which clinics have the fewest adverse outcomes.

】

item.title: 父母与科技的关系比孩子更糟糕
item.description:
成年人牺牲社交联系，沉迷于手机，给孩子们树立了一个坏榜样。【原文：

Adults are sacrificing social connection to veg out with their phones, setting a bad example for kids.

】

item.title: 华尔街进入黑暗时代，大部分股票交易已被隐藏
item.description: 关于全球最大、流动性最强的公开股票市场，有一个令人惊讶的新事实：市场上的大部分交易活动都不再公开。【原文：Here’s a surprising new fact about the world’s largest and most-liquid public equity market: Most of the activity on it isn’t public anymore.】

item.title: 通用汽车的中国合作伙伴上汽集团因减值而利润大幅下滑
item.description: 通用汽车公司的中国合作伙伴--上汽集团称，由于美国汽车制造商在中国的合资企业减值和一场激烈的价格战，2024 年的初步利润可能会大幅下降多达 90%。【原文：SAIC Motor Corp., the Chinese partner of General Motors Co., said preliminary profit for 2024 may plummet by as much as 90% due to a writedown of the US carmaker’s joint venture in the nation and a bruising price war.】

item.title: 特朗普重返欧佩克政治舞台令下个月的石油谈判更加复杂
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）呼吁欧佩克+（OPEC+）降低油价，为下个月的部长级小组会议增加了赌注。【原文：US President Donald Trump has raised the stakes for a meeting of an OPEC+ ministerial panel next month, with his call for the group to lower oil prices.】

item.title: 印尼认为仍有降息空间以实现 GDP 增长目标
item.description: 印尼央行仍认为有进一步放宽货币政策的空间，以帮助推动经济增长达到今年 5.2% 的目标。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank still sees scope for further monetary easing to help propel economic growth to its 5.2% target this year.】

item.title: 瑞典人工智能初创公司 Sana Labs 目标几年内在美国上市
item.description: 人工智能初创企业萨纳实验室公司（Sana Labs AB）的目标是在几年内成为美国的一家上市公司，加入瑞典科技公司青睐北美更深层次的资本市场这一日益增长的趋势。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Sana Labs AB is aiming to become a public company in the US in a couple of years, joining a growing trend of Swedish technology firms favoring the deeper capital markets of North America.】

item.title: 外汇损失抵消了强劲的旅游需求，IndiGo 盈利不佳
item.description: 按市场份额计算，InterGlobe 航空有限公司是印度最大的航空公司，该公司公布的季度利润低于预期，原因是与外汇有关的亏损增加，抵消了在以旅游需求强劲著称的时期增加客运量所带来的收益。【原文：InterGlobe Aviation Ltd., which operates India’s largest airline by market share, reported quarterly profit that missed expectations as a larger foreign exchange-related loss offset gains from flying more passengers during a period known for strong travel demand.】

item.title: 美联储利率走势分化，美银策略师认为股市走势更佳
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，随着全球央行的降息速度超过美联储，股票涨势可能会变得更加广泛，从而帮助经济增长回升。【原文：Stock gains could become more broad-based as global central banks cut interest rates faster than the Federal Reserve, helping growth to pick up, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】

item.title: 关税风险缓解，欧元有望创一年来最佳一周表现
item.description: 在投资者降低了对降息的预期，并押注美国贸易关税不会像之前担心的那样很快生效之后，欧元将迎来一年多来表现最好的一周。【原文：The euro is heading for its best week in more than a year after investors pared back expectations for interest rate cuts and bet that US trade tariffs won’t come into force as soon as previously feared.】

item.title: 企业内部人士在 S&P 500 指数上涨中以创纪录的速度抛售股票
item.description: 本周，美国公司股价飙升至创纪录水平，似乎摆脱了对关税、移民和通胀的担忧。然而，公司高管们却在做一件明显不那么看涨的事：他们在快速抛售股票。【原文：Shares of US companies roared to a record this week, seemingly shrugging off worries about tariffs, immigration and inflation. Yet, company executives are doing something decidedly less bullish — they’re selling their stocks at a rapid pace.】

item.title: 中国三一重工考虑出售印度业务股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国工程机械制造商三一重工股份有限公司正在考虑出售其印度业务的股份。【原文：Chinese construction-machinery maker Sany Heavy Industry Co. is considering selling a stake in its India business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 经济专员称欧盟面临落后于美国和中国的风险
item.description: 欧盟经济委员瓦尔蒂斯-东布罗夫斯基斯（Valdis Dombrovskis）表示，欧盟需要做更多工作才能跟上美国和中国的步伐。【原文：The European Union needs to do more to keep up with the US and China, according to Economics Commissioner Valdis Dombrovskis.】

item.title: 特朗普上任首周，国债毫无起色
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任第二任总统的第一周结束时，美国债券市场的表现与开始时差不多。【原文：The US bond market is ending the first week of Donald Trump’s second presidency pretty much where it began.】

item.title: 南非煤炭出口自 2017 年以来首次改善
item.description: 由于国有物流公司 Transnet SOC Ltd. 的铁路运输有所改善，南非七年来首次增加了非洲大陆最大码头的煤炭出口量。【原文：South Africa increased coal exports from the biggest terminal on the continent for the first time in seven years after an improvement in rail shipments by state-owned logistics company Transnet SOC Ltd.】

item.title: 英国采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，英国裁员速度为金融危机后所见
item.description: 2025 年伊始，滞胀的恐惧笼罩着英国，一项备受关注的调查显示，就业岗位的削减速度达到了金融危机后的水平。【原文：Stagflation fears stalked Britain at the start of 2025 with a closely watched survey showing jobs being slashed at a pace seen in the aftermath of the financial crisis.】

item.title: 贝恩支持的可持续燃料生产商 EcoCeres 将在欧洲上市
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）支持的可持续燃料生产商 EcoCeres Inc.【原文：EcoCeres Inc., a producer of sustainable fuel backed by Bain Capital, is exploring an initial public offering that could value the company at about $5 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】
